short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download all images, gifs, and videos within a 4chan thread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight extension that allows you to download all images, gifs, and videos within a 4chan thread at the click of a button. You can configure what extensions to download in the settings panel.
